name: Monthly Appraisal Bonus
formula: (base * 0.25) if monthly_appraisal_score >= 95 else (base * 0.225) if monthly_appraisal_score >= 90 else (base * 0.20) if monthly_appraisal_score >= 75 else (base * 0.15) if monthly_appraisal_score >= 65 else (base * 0.10) if monthly_appraisal_score >= 50 else 0.0
description: Bonus mensuel basé sur le score d'évaluation mensuel de l'employé.
